00270 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 |   PLT_GetSCPDXMLIterator
00272 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00277 template <class T>
00278 class PLT_GetSCPDXMLIterator
00279 {
00280 public:
00281     PLT_GetSCPDXMLIterator<T>(NPT_XmlElementNode* node) :
00282         m_Node(node) {}
00283       
00284     NPT_Result operator()(T* const & data) const {
00285         return data->GetSCPDXML(m_Node);
00286     }
00287 
00288 private:
00289     NPT_XmlElementNode* m_Node;
00290 };
00291 
00292 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 |   PLT_ActionDescNameFinder
00294 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00299 class PLT_ActionDescNameFinder
00300 {
00301 public:
00302     // methods
00303     PLT_ActionDescNameFinder(PLT_Service* service, const char* name) : 
00304         m_Service(service), m_Name(name) {}
00305     virtual ~PLT_ActionDescNameFinder() {}
00306 
00307     bool operator()(const PLT_ActionDesc* const & action_desc) const {
00308         return action_desc->GetName().Compare(m_Name, true) ? false : true;
00309     }
00310 
00311 private:
00312     // members
00313     PLT_Service* m_Service;
00314     NPT_String   m_Name;
00315 };
